term.title: fissile

item.text: Of a nuclide: capable of undergoing fission by interaction with (slow) neutrons.
Of a material: containing one or more fissile nuclides.

term.sources: 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' De Bruin, M.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 1982 54(8) 1533
